text: Hiwahi Chongpeii ngaikha eii, “Nangni in zool-inthai thomaru, mi thatmaru, inruup thomaru, mi-ngai neinaak ra-ot maru” hiwa ngai rakip chungnga chongpeii inkhatbit in aminsuk wiakjei khawa khachu, napumtak ni-inriang angnga na-indiang inwaipui ngaikha minriangro.” Suok 20:13-15; Innidan 5:2,17-19; Levi 19:18
